description:
Unlocks the Meiwa FC Uniform + Challenge Ball Set in Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions' Versus and Online Versus mode matches.

Includes the following:
- Meiwa FC Uniform
- Tsubasa's Challenge Ball to Wakabayashi
Customise even more your team and matches with these news items!

Defy The Laws of Football
Become Legend
name: Captain Tsubasa: RoNC Meiwa FC Uniform + Challenge Ball Set
